nodes.text: 400100500260026 was an independent territory in the Gordian Reach consisting of sixteen planets ruled by G0-T0 droids.

In 3946 BBY, a number of G0-T0 droids seceded from the Galactic Republic, cutting off HoloNet communications and blocking all traffic in and out of the sector. That same year, Supreme Chancellor Cressa organized a successful Republic effort to recapture the worlds.
